name: Greater Lunarchidna
description: A medium-sized aberration with ability to climb and stealth, utilizing webs and necrotic damage.
memorable: Its ability to wrap up opponents, blinding and suffocating them while in combat makes it particularly fearsome.
goals: To ambush and incapacitate its enemies using stealth and necrotic attacks.
relations: Related to other aberrations and creatures lurking in dark environments or webs.
environment: Typically found in dark, damp places away from sunlight.
strengths: Resilient to poison and able to manipulate webs, making it an effective ambusher.
weaknesses: Significantly hindered by sunlight, suffering disadvantages in bright areas.
attacks: Utilizes claws and bites infused with necrotic energy to drain life from its prey.
most_powerful_ability: The Wrap Up ability allows it to incapacitate enemies, causing continuous damage and hindrance.
senses: Possesses blindsight for 10 feet, which aids its stealth in darkness.
skills: Excels in stealth with a +7 modifier, making it very competent in ambush situations.
additional_information: Immunity to poison damage and condition immunities to being poisoned and restrained.
Spider Climb allows for traversal on difficult surfaces.
Spellcaster with access to a variety of illusory and damaging spells.
Webbing can restrain opponents, complicating battles for unwary foes.
Can only wrap one creature at a time, making tactical choices crucial.
spellcasting: 4th-level spellcaster with access to spells like magic missile and suggestion.
test_queries: necrotic damage monster that excels in stealth
creature that drains hit points with bites
